name: pushstate
description: A basic JS library that uses PushState to update the browser address bar, add history items, and emulate requests without doing a full page reload. Great for single-page web applications.
releasenote: Improved form submission to make it easier to work with the submitted values. Added support for ignoring anchor `#` links (optional, on by default). Ignore Ctrl-Click, Right Click etc when clicking links.
